content: Hybrid, Open Data Lakehouse with IBM watsonx.data Audit and compliance For regulatory and internal compliance, IBM watsonx.data provides audit capabilities that enable administrators to track access patterns and permissions changes. Here are some key features:  Access logging: Log all access events for auditing purposes.  Regular audits: Schedule audits to review and adjust group permissions as needed.  Policy-based alerts: Set up alerts for unauthorized access attempts to help ensure that administrators are informed of potential security issues.
